ModMetaData.name: RimForge
ModMetaData.author: Epicguru (James B)
ModMetaData.description:
A mid-tech modpack that changes and expands upon power and smithing:
* Wireless electrical power. * Tesla coils! Fry those raiders! * New ores: copper and tin. * Many new metal alloys: bronze, gilded plasteel, staballoy etc. With unique stats and purposes. * A forge, to create metal alloys, with a forge temperature system. * New melee weapons. Some require the new alloys. No particular theme. * New 'stabilized' guns, with Bronze as their main crafting material. Improved accuracy but reduced damage.
Also supports:
[Combat Extended] Some recipes are changed for balance purposes. Allows for stuffable melee weapons to be crafted out of certain alloys (CE normally forces all melee weapons to use Steel, Uranium or Plasteel). Balance of new melee weapons and guns may need tweaking, please give feedback.
[In-Game Wiki] Shows useful information about the mod's items and buildings, such as how to set up the forge.
